--- title: "Participant, the 1st Council Meeting of the Smart Education Professional Committee" description: "Participation in the council meeting for smart education professionals" date: 2025-09-13 #categories: [smart-education, professional-committee, council-meeting] image: p1.jpg --- ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](p1.jpg){fig-align='center' width=70%} ::: :::

Group photo after the meeting


# Abstract Participant at the 1st Council Meeting of the Smart Education Professional Committee of the China Association for Non-Government Education held in Beijing in September 2025. This meeting brought together educational professionals and experts to discuss strategic directions and initiatives in smart education. # Event Details - **Date:** September 2025 - **Location:** Beijing - **Event:** The 1st Council Meeting of the Smart Education Professional Committee - **Hosting Organization:** China Association for Non-Government Education - **Role:** Participant # Audience This council meeting convened professionals and leaders in the smart education field from the China Association for Non-Government Education to collaboratively advance smart education initiatives and policy discussions.
